TopicTitle: Just purchased KSP - Unable to connect to update server

Articles.Content:
Hello,

I just purchased KSP and upon starting it tells me there is a new version, but try as I may, when patcher.exe come up and runs and I enter my user/pass, it comes up with 'Update Error - Unable to connect to update server'

I know that the program is not blocked, because if I enter the wrong password for my account, then it will tell me 'Update Error - You are not authorized to do an update. Check your Login info.'

Is the update server down or is this a problem?

Thank you
The server\'s been taken down, due to security issues with the current patcher; a new version of the patcher will be released with 14.2.
If you took time to read other threads on this issue, you would see that the update server is shut down temporarily due to bugs in the security of it.

If you took time to read other threads on this issue, you would see that the update server is shut down temporarily due to bugs in the security of it.

Don\'t get all butthurt, I searched the forum for 'patcher' and didn\'t see anything about it being shut down in the first 30 or so results...
I\'m sure he meant it in the nicest way possible, oh and welcome to the forums

Now, now, people. Be nice. It\'s a real PITA when you pay for something and only then you find out that you can\'t actually get it. It\'s being worked on, hopefully it will be resolved soon.

Oh and yes, welcome to the forums.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!
